title: "Data Import"
output: html_document
date: "2025-09-16"
---

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import data!

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Clean up names!

```{r}
litters_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Check the names!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

Try skimming with skimr! Wow!

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missing values

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", 
           na = c("NA", "", " "))
```


# Import Pups data

```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv",
           skip = 3,
           na = c("NA", "", " "))
```
